description: The procurement is pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/PQ.  The requirement is solicited amongst the Indigenous Suppliers (SA holders) under the stream of PSIB (Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business).  The required products: Category 3 – Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
full_summary:
### Call for Proposals
#### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Tender Title:** Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
**Tender Reference Number:** cb-5985-68300652

**Proposal Details:**

- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Procurement Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/PQ
- **PSIB Stream:** Indigenous Suppliers

**Products Required:**

- Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets (Category 3)

**Key Dates:**

- **Publication Date:** May 30, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** June 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET)
- **Amendment Date:** June 12, 2023

**Contact Information:**

- **Contracting Authority:** Global Affairs Canada
- **Contact Person:** Shenny Dai
- **Contact Email:** [shenny.dai@international.gc.ca](mailto:shenny.dai@international.gc.ca)
- **Contact Phone:** (613) 791-6782
- **Contact Address:** 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0G2, Canada

**Notice and Attachments:**

The tender notice, RFP, Amendment, Q&A, and Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) documents can be found on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell web portal: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Explanatory Notes:

This tender is issued pursuant to a Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/PQ. It is reserved for Indigenous Suppliers under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) stream. Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents to be considered for this procurement.

We have provided amendments to the original Solicitation, which specified that no installation services were required. Suppliers are expected to provide Q and A responses as outlined in the related documents.

The tender closing date is June 12, 2023, at 2:00 PM (ET). Please submit your proposals according to the instructions provided in the RFP documents.

### Contact Us

For further information or clarification, please refer to the contact information listed above or visit [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://can
